full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN RLABS ROL MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016B (CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB @017A *, ,KYI SGO NAS RAB GNAS BYED TSUL BYIN BRLABS KYI ROL MTSO ZHES PA 'DI NI RAB GNAS CHO GA DU MA DANG, DAM PA'I PHYAG BZHES MTHONG BRGYAD BZHIN, RANG GZHAN LA PHAN 'DOD KYI BSAM PAS BTZUN GZUGS BRNYAN DHARMA BADZRA GYIS, 'PHAR PA ZHES PA LCAGS MO GLANG GI DBYAR DUS KYI DGA' BA LA LANG TSO DAR KA BABS PAS NA, ,SKYID MO TSAL GYI BSTI GNAS YID DGA' CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI AOR DU SU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS PA SARBA YANTU, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
